  • Method Details

    • calculatePricing

      public float calculatePricing​(float roomPricePerUnit)
      Later on, here will be a method that calculates the price for the conference room, this is done by taking the hours the room is being booked multiplied by the price per hour. Maybe some special stuff like a beamer or else will be added to the calulation.
